task.title: Laundry Room Etiquette
task.shortdesc: Like many NC State students, this may be your first time doing laundry in a shared facility. It is important to practice laundry room etiquette to respect your fellow residents and their belongings.

context.p: Here are some things to keep in mind while using the shared laundry rooms:

step.cmd: Be timely in removing clothes from washers and dryers

substep.cmd: Download the speedqueen app to see when machines are available
Set a timer on your phone to keep track of time

step.cmd: Do no use an excessive amount of machines during peak hours

info.p: Peak hours include weekdays after 3pm and weekends

step.cmd: Give other residents a 15-20 minute grace period before removing their clothes from the machine

substep.cmd: Place wet clothes on top of the washing machine
Place dry clothes on the folding table

step.cmd: Make sure to remove all clothes from the machines
Leave the washing machine doors open after use to prevent mildew
